term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Expresses sympathy for the victims and their families of the fire at the ABC Daycare Center in Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico.
Commends the firefighters and civilians who risked their lives to rescue children from the fire and the Shriner's Hospital for Children in Sacramento, California, for providing assistance.
Acknowledges the importance of fire codes and fire sprinkler systems in avoiding such tragedies.
